controlbar.description: A Boolean value that specifies if you want to display the control panel for the media player

height.description: Height of the media player, in pixels.

quality.description: The quality of the media playback (only used for flash fallback)

source.description: The URL (absolute or relative to the current page) to the movie files, supported formats are (mp4,ogg,webm). not every Browser supports the same format, define as many formats possible. You can define the urls as string list or as array

align.description: Specifies the horizontal alignment of the media player. You can select from left, right, and center.

bgcolor.description: The background color of the media player specified as a Hexadecimal value or or a recognized color name, for example red.

oncomplete.description: Custom JavaScript function to run when the FLV file has finished playing.

wmode.description: Specifies the absolute positioning and layering capabilities in your browser

width.description: Width of the media player, in pixels.

printjscontrols.description: it set to true, all possible JS Controls ar printed after the video.

autoplay.description: A Boolean value that specifies if the media player must automatically play the FLV file on loading the CFM page

image.description: image displayed when movie is stopped

name.description: Name of the media player. the name attribute is required when you invoke JavaScript functions.

load.description: if set to true, start loading before play was pressed.

onload.description: Custom JavaScript function to run on loading of the player component.

hideborder.description: A Boolean value that specifies if you want a border for the media player panel

title.description: Title for the video, if not set, the video file name is used.

delimiter.description: delimiter used to separate urls in source attribute, default is comma

onstart.description: Custom JavaScript function to run when the FLV file starts playing.
